name: part_011
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ3周年記念LIVE】MIX2 - 私の居場所 - 【3DLIVE】 [knb_mosTUvo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa performs her original song 'Sunpitallia' on stage.
MC section: Tokoyami Towa thanks the audience for her 3rd anniversary and looks forward to the next year.
Closing credits sequence featuring guests and staff as highlight reels play.

subtitles.original: 晴れて
subtitles.english: ...and clear,

subtitles.original: なくさないように 息をする
subtitles.english: I take a breath so I won't lose it.

subtitles.original:
サンピタリア
作詞・作曲・編曲：keeno
subtitles.english:
Sunpitallia
Lyrics, Composition & Arrangement: keeno

subtitles.original: 眩むような青空の真ん中で今も泣いているのは
subtitles.english: In the middle of a blinding blue sky, the one who is still crying...

subtitles.original: 君が映る世界が 悲しくなるほど優しいから
subtitles.english: ...is because the world reflecting you is so painfully kind.

subtitles.original: 苦しくなるほど遠いから
subtitles.english: Because it's so painfully far away.

subtitles.original: じくじくと疼く甘い熱は 閉じ込めていたのに
subtitles.english: I'd locked away this sweet, throbbing fever,

subtitles.original: 痛くて零れた
subtitles.english: but the pain made it spill out.

subtitles.original: 君と私の体と体の間にある
subtitles.english: Between your body and mine,

subtitles.original: 酷く薄い皮膚さえ もう邪魔になるくらい
subtitles.english: even this terribly thin skin feels like an obstacle.

subtitles.original: その鼓膜 その心臓 ずっと奥にさわられたら
subtitles.english: If you touch my eardrums, my heart, deep inside...

subtitles.original: 君はまた笑うのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you'll smile again.

subtitles.original: ねえどうか君まで届け
subtitles.english: Hey, please, let it reach you.

subtitles.original: 強がって笑った
subtitles.english: I put on a tough face and laughed,

subtitles.original: 息を呑むような橙の中で
subtitles.english: within this breathtaking orange glow.

subtitles.original: 君が見てる世界の隅っこでいいからいさせて
subtitles.english: In a corner of the world you see, just let me be there.

subtitles.original: どこでもいいから私を見て
subtitles.english: Anywhere is fine, just look at me.

subtitles.original: ねえ 明日は晴れかな雨かななんて
subtitles.english: Hey, wondering if tomorrow will be sunny or rainy...

subtitles.original: そんなこと当たり前に思えるのは
subtitles.english: the reason I can think of such things as natural...

subtitles.original: 君がいたから
subtitles.english: is because you were here.

subtitles.original: でもね今もこの胸を締め付ける空の色に
subtitles.english: But you know, even now, the color of the sky tightens my chest.

subtitles.original: 立ち尽くしたまま動けないのは
subtitles.english: The reason I stand frozen and unable to move...

subtitles.original: 頬が濡れていくのは君のせいだ
subtitles.english: and my cheeks getting wet, it's all your fault.

subtitles.original: そんなこと思ってしまったの
subtitles.english: I ended up thinking that...

subtitles.original: 思ってしまったんだ
subtitles.english: I ended up thinking that.

subtitles.original: 私ひとつ分の涙じゃ 全然足りないくらいに
subtitles.english: With just my own tears, it's not nearly enough;

subtitles.original: 涸れそうでひび割れて 心が止まりそうなの
subtitles.english: parched and cracked, my heart feels like it'll stop.

subtitles.original: 言葉にしようとすればするほど
subtitles.english: The more I try to put it into words,

subtitles.original: 嗚咽になって溶け出して しまうから
subtitles.english: the more it turns into sobs and melts away.

subtitles.original: 君と私の体と体の間にある
subtitles.english: Between your body and mine,

subtitles.original: 呼吸も温度も もう邪魔になるくらい
subtitles.english: even our breath and warmth feel like obstacles.

subtitles.original: その鼓膜 その心臓
subtitles.english: Those eardrums, that heart,

subtitles.original: ずっと奥にさわるから
subtitles.english: because I'll touch you deep inside.

subtitles.original: 私を見付けてよ
subtitles.english: Find me.

subtitles.original: 壊れても叫ぶから
subtitles.english: Even if I break, I'll keep shouting.

subtitles.original: ねえどうか君まで届け
subtitles.english: Hey, please, let it reach you.

subtitles.original: 3年間ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the past three years!

subtitles.original: これからも、4年目もよろしくね！みんな大好きだよ！
subtitles.english: Please keep supporting me in the 4th year! I love you all!
